title: Beyond Meat Stock Is Volatile. Wall Street Is Excited Anyway.
text:
Beyond Meat stock is volatile—as seen in its 3.9% drop on Wednesday. Learning to trade hot, new, disruptive technologies trade is challenging, to say the least. That hasn’t stopped Wall Street from feeding the frenzy over the stock.

Wednesday, Canadian doughnut chain Tim Horton’s announced plans to scale back some Beyond Meat (ticker: BYND) promotions. That could have caused the drop. Or perhaps the decline was catalyzed by charges alternative meat is too heavily processed, making nutrients less “bioavailable.” That’s what...
description: Beyond Meat stock is volatile. That hasn’t stopped Wall Street from feeding the frenzy over the stock.
